<script type="text/javascript" src="http://baike.bdimg.com/static/wiki-common/pkg/wiki-common_sync_js_1_f0a981d.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://baike.bdimg.com/static/wiki-common/pkg/wiki-common_sync_js_2_7a24e62.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">!function(){    !function(){
      var $ = require('wiki-common:widget/lib/jquery/jquery.js'),
        winResizeTimer;

      $(window).on('resize', function(){
        clearTimeout(winResizeTimer);
        winResizeTimer = setTimeout(function(){
          var winWidth = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement &amp;&amp; document.documentElement.clientWidth || 0,
            pageWidth = 'SMALL';

          // 获取 body 宽度设定。
              var pageWidthDef = {
      SMALL: 980,
      LARGE: 1180
    };

    if (winWidth &gt;= 1280) {    // @media screen and (min-width: 1280px)
      pageWidth = 'LARGE';
    } else {                  // Default width.
      pageWidth = 'SMALL';
    }
  

          document.body.className = $.trim((' ' + document.body.className + ' ').replace(/ w-(?:small|large) /, ' w-' + pageWidth.toLowerCase() + ' '));

          // 通知页面宽度变化事件。
          $(document.body).triggerHandler({
            'type': 'resize.cmnEvt',
            'pageWidth': pageWidthDef[pageWidth]
          });
        }, 100);
      });
    }();
  }();
!function(){  var $ = require('wiki-common:widget/lib/jquery/jquery.js'),
    userbar = require('wiki-common:widget/component/userbar/userbar.js');
    
  $(function() {
    userbar.buildUserbar($('.wgt-userbar'), null);
  });
}();
!function(){    var $ = require('wiki-common:widget/lib/jquery/jquery.js'),
      initSearchbar = require('wiki-common:widget/component/searchbar/searchbar.js');  
    initSearchbar($('.wgt-searchbar-simple'));
  }();
!function(){  require('wiki-tag:widget/category/category.js');
}();
!function(){  require('wiki-tag:widget/sidebar/sidebar.js');
}();
!function(){      require('wiki-common:widget/component/psLink/psLink.js');
    }();</script>
